name: Lost In A Mirror
description:
Oh no!  In a horrible accident Boxo's brother, Cuboi, has fallen into the Mirror Dimension!  Help Boxo save his bro by collecting shards, exploring the Mirror Dimension, and fighting Mirror Monsters!  Easy to play, hard to master.  Exciting challenges are ahead in "Lost In A Mirror" by: Josh Lawrence.

TIPS

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Shift to hop

Press up to climb vines

Press up and jump to zoom up vines fast

Defeat Pentedemons (The square flashy bad guys) by jumping on top of them

Defeat Twitchflappers (The circle floating ones) by jumping at them (Does not have to be on top of)

Collect 4 Mirror Shards to repair a mirror

Crumbly blocks will break if you move horizontally on them

Lava will burn you

Rain just looks cool

Falling stars look even cooler

Collect 16 shards to repair the MEGA MIRROR!!! (Woahhh)
